title: About
text:
Hi.
I am Antonio Páez.
I am an Engineer and Geographer. I have been a professor of geography at McMaster University since 2002. I have long-standing interests in math, society, art, politics, computer languages, and poetry.
Not sure what this blog will look like yet, but likely will be a combination of musing, arts, writing, and occasional professional news.

Ungrammetical Correctors Society © 2023 by Antonio Paez is licensed under CC BY-NC-ND 4.0. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is my blog. I will blog occasionally. The blog was created with Quarto.
This was me, sometime during the pandemic. I am older now.

title: Inktober 2023
text:
Welcome to Inktober!
Inktober is an annual challenge: 31 days and 31 drawings. It is a great opportunity to be creating, to learn something new, to improve your drawing skills. It can be a lot of things, and it is to a lot of people: since it was created in 2009 by Jake Parker it has grown into an international event with thousands upon thousands of participants.
This year I am too busy to create something new, but I will take the opportunity to learn something new: blogging. And I will repost my Inktober drawings of 2016 that I had not made public before. Hope you will enjoy!

title: Inktober 2023
text:
Inktober 2023.
An Alphabet for the XXI Century proudly presents the letter A.

title: Inktober 2023
text:
Welcome to Inktober!
Inktober is an annual challenge: 31 days and 31 drawings. It is a great opportunity to be creating, to learn something new, to improve your drawing skills. It can be a lot of things, and it is to a lot of people: since it was created in 2009 by Jake Parker it has grown into an international event with thousands upon thousands of participants.
This year I am too busy to create something new, but I will take the opportunity to learn something new: blogging. And I will repost my Inktober drawings of 2016 that I had not made public before. Hope you will enjoy!
